definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: She was bed-ridden after small successive strokes;
sentences.chinese: 在接连的小中风后她卧床不起。

sentences.english: We feasted for weeks on the deer that daddy shot.
sentences.chinese: 我们接连数周饱餐了父亲猎得的鹿肉。

sentences.english: A central New York man hit the criminal justice trifecta , three arrests in three hours.
sentences.chinese: 纽约一男子在三小时内创下接连被捕三次的记录。

sentences.english: One failed agency after another attempted to bring order to the mobilization effort.
sentences.chinese: 为了有效进行战争动员，所尝试的各种手段接连告败。

sentences.english: The buds and branches shall be of one piece with the lampstand, hammered out of pure gold.
sentences.chinese: 球和枝子要接连一块，都是一块精金锤出来的。

sentences.english: He ran off his four diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 他接连打出了四张方块。

sentences.english: It was not long before he began to quarrel with his wife and later family conflicts were a usual practice.
sentences.chinese: 没过多久他就和妻子争吵起来，家庭冲突接连不断。

sentences.english: After three unsuccessful attempts, return to the wall to practice the pose.
sentences.chinese: 如果接连三次都不能成功，那就回到墙边去练习。

sentences.english: The Bai Ren with heart grey cold meaning encounters accident one after another.
sentences.chinese: 心灰意冷的伯仁接连遭遇不测。

sentences.english: As the project develop, unsuspected difficulty come to the fore.
sentences.chinese: 的发展，没有料到的困难接连出现了。

sentences.english: He succeeded in shooting down nine of the suns.
sentences.chinese: 他乐成接连射落九个太阳。

sentences.english: A rash of self-mutilations by prison inmates is disturbing.
sentences.chinese: 监狱囚犯的自毁行为接连不断，令人担忧。

sentences.english: Three flower shows succeeded one another in quick succession.
sentences.chinese: 三个花展一个个地接连举行。

sentences.english: The flesh of a deer used as food.
sentences.chinese: 我们接连数周饱餐了父亲猎得的鹿肉。

sentences.english: Successional 3 days have sleep to be able to become nightmare, how can ability become nightmare?
sentences.chinese: 接连3天有睡就会做噩梦，怎么才能不做噩梦？

sentences.english: In the US they appear to be succeeding.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，这些看起来在接连不断的发生。

definition: early or late/priority/in succession/one after another
